name: 王賢達
objective: 教導學生自然纖維，再生纖維，半合成纖，一般合成纖維,如聚酯,尼龍,亞克力,等 及特殊合成纖維，其製備,抽絲,結構,化性,物性,用途等
schedule:
1. Cotton(2 weeks)
2. Jute(1/2 week)
3. Wool(2 weeks)
4. Silk(1 week)
5. Acetate Fiber(1/2 week)
6. Rayon(1 week)
Mid-term Exam(1 week)
7. PET, PBT(2 weeks)
8. Nylons(1 week)
9. PAN, Carbon Fiber(2 weeks)
10. Polyolefin Fibers(1 week)
11.PVA Fiber(1 week)
12. Elastomeric Fibers(1 week)
13. Aramide Fibers(1 week)
14. PBI, LC Fibers, Polyimde Fibers, PPS(1 week)
15. Glass Fibers, Ceramic Fibers, Optical Fibers(If Time Available)
Final Exam(1 week)
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials: Handbook of Fiber Chemistry(M.Lewin ed. 3rd ed. CRC, 2006)
